config.footerInfo:
<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8" async="" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/live2d-widget@3.1.4/lib/L2Dwidget.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
  setTimeout(() => {
    L2Dwidget.init({
      "model": {
        "scale": 1
      },
      "display": {
        "position": "right",
        "width": 200,
        "height": 280,
        "hOffset": 0,
        "vOffset": 0
      },
      "mobile": {
        "show": true,
        "scale": 0.5
      },
      "react": {
        "opacityDefault": 0.7,
        "opacityOnHover": 0.2
      }
    });
  }, 1000)
  </script>
